MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA6 postcode area of Johnstone. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30pm due to a damaged underground cable, caused by a third party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:34pm on Friday, 08 January 2021
